meanings.definition: The quality of being suited to serve a purpose or fulfill a role.
meanings.sent1: The functionality of the new tool impressed everyone in the office.
meanings.sent2: The smartphone's functionality includes making calls, sending messages, and browsing the internet.
meanings.sent3: The robot's functionality was so advanced that it started making coffee for the team.
meanings.sent4: The functionality of the key to success unlocked many opportunities for the young entrepreneur.
meanings.sent5: The car's functionality as a mode of transportation was crucial for the road trip.

meanings.definition: The range of operations that a machine or system can perform.
meanings.sent1: The functionality of the printer allows it to scan, copy, and print documents.
meanings.sent2: When testing the new software, they discovered a bug affecting its functionality.
meanings.sent3: The functionality of the vending machine surprised the students when it started giving out free snacks.
meanings.sent4: The functionality of the clock tower extended beyond telling time to controlling the town's lights.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship's functionality in navigating through space was unmatched by any other craft.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is useful or practical.
meanings.sent1: The functionality of the backpack with multiple compartments made it perfect for hiking.
meanings.sent2: The functionality of the new app simplified the process of tracking expenses.
meanings.sent3: The functionality of the umbrella hat drew curious looks from passersby on the rainy day.
meanings.sent4: The functionality of the magic wand amazed the children as it granted their wishes.
meanings.sent5: The functionality of the flashlight in the dark cave saved the explorers from getting lost.
